title: Google\Cloud\DataLabeling\V1beta1\Instruction
name: Instruction
description:
Instruction of how to perform the labeling task for human operators.

Currently only PDF instruction is supported.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.Instruction

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. The display name of the instruction. Maximum of 64 characters.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. User-provided description of the instruction. The description can be up to 10000 characters long.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. Last update time of instruction.

params.name: data.data_type
params.description: Required. The data type of this instruction.

params.name: data.csv_instruction
params.description: Deprecated: this instruction format is not supported any more. Instruction from a CSV file, such as for classification task. The CSV file should have exact two columns, in the following format: The first column is labeled data, such as an image reference, text. The second column is comma separated labels associated with data.

params.name: data.pdf_instruction
params.description: Instruction from a PDF document. The PDF should be in a Cloud Storage bucket.

params.name: data.blocking_resources
params.description: Output only. The names of any related resources that are blocking changes to the instruction.

methods.name: getCsvInstruction
methods.description:
Deprecated: this instruction format is not supported any more.

Instruction from a CSV file, such as for classification task. The CSV file should have exact two columns, in the following format:

  • The first column is labeled data, such as an image reference, text.
  • The second column is comma separated labels associated with data.
